bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: you Honor at a time and place therein to be specified to do and receive what shall then and there be considered by our honor him. Together with the time and cause of his detention and said writ and that he may be restured to his liberty.
Territory of Washington County of Pierce } ss
John Dougherty being sworn says that he has read the going petition and believes the same to be true
Subscribed & and sworn to before me this 3d day of March 1874
Territory of Washington King County } ss
In the Matter of John Dougherty application for writ of Habeas Corpus}

On reading and filing the petition of John Dougherty duly signed and verified by him whereby it appears that he is illegally imprisoned and restrained of his liberty by W. Dawssdown at at Pierce County Washington Territory and stating wherein the illegality councils from
